name: Artist   Pig#040
description:
40th artwork from the collection of pig
pig is the symbol of wealth and fertility, so I’ve chosen the pig to represent this collection (in the first step). In this collection, I have portrayed pig in the form of characters, each representing a specific personality, stratum and symbol of a specific concept, in order to use these symbols and concepts into modern human life.
Road map:
This collection contains 100 works of art,  ONE OF ONE will be uploaded in Hic et nunc. From number 31 to 100, the price of the works also increases with every 10 loads. 10 works are uploaded every week.
Numbers 41 to 50 will be uploaded next week
